price: si dhe popullin e Nuhut më parë, sepse qe më i padrejtë dhe rebel;
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū hum aẓlama wa-aṭghā
